content: @DPC you mentioned in #zulip that you wanted weekly streams -- I suspect if it's truly weekly there's not much advantage to a bot creating the stream?
by weekly streams i mean a stream per week. And someone needs to create it. Just that it would make it easier but i guess we can leave it to manual work
the idea is to have 1 thread per stream so that all the triage reports for the week are in the same place
yeah so I suspect that just asking people to create a stream as needed is the better approach here
it's what we do for everything else anyway
